attributes.review: To start off this app took over 12 hours to download and completely disabled my phone during the process. My phone wouldn’t even turn on while the app was downloading and once it was downloaded my phone would not stop glitching and pop up adds came on my home screen every few seconds. I then deleted the app and I still had pop-up adds showing up on my phone and my phone would glitch and turn off every minute. Due to this I had to get a whole new phone and I had to sell my dog in order to have the money for it. My dog however was the only thing keeping rodents from infesting my house so then I had skunks, mice, rats, and possums in my bed ever night. Due to the awful infestation I had to move out of my house and demolish it and I am now living in a motel room. I still currently have no money due to having to buy a new phone so I am in a very low quality hotel room. Because of this there are holes in the walls and the people in the room next to me keep shoving soggy hotdogs through the holes. Due to my lack of money the soggy hotdogs have been my only source of food for the past week. My skin and hair then reeked of old hotdogs and my employer fired me for this. Side note my employer is my father and because of having to fire me he has now disowned me as well as the rest of my family. The last time I got a soggy hotdog was yesterday morning so I am led to believe the people next to me have also disowned me. My phone, dog, house, money, job, friends, family, and food are now gone. I have nothing else to live for and believe I may be eaten alive by the rodents in my past house as revenge because I took their lavish life from them. If I do not report back here just know it was all because of this app and by the time you’re reading this I am just a pile of bones picked clean by the revengeful rodents.
attributes.title: This app stole my life from me

attributes.review: This app is hecka dumb. Yall rlly out here sayin the cheeto pumkin lookin- gonna save the US of A. Bruh wat. He finna make us get yeeted. Plus the lies and lies from this cheeto puff. Ummmm also we finna save tik tok yall 😌
attributes.title: GET YEETED
